casebody.data:
Wednesday, May 15, 1996

MERIT DOCKET

96-480. Smith v. Record Custodian, Ohio Dept. of Pub. Safety, Bur. of Motor Vehicles.

In Mandamus. On answer of respondent. Sua sponte, the cause is dismissed without prejudice for failure of relator to comply with the affidavit requirement of S.Ct.Prac.R. X(4)(B).

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Stratton, JJ., concur.
